Package com.sicomsa.dmt.svc

package com.sicomsa.dmt.svc
This package contains classes that implement SAT's massive download web service. For CFDIs downloading.

Class DownloadService implements DMTService providing concrete implementations for the following methods that consume the web service:

  • Method DownloadService.autentica(jakarta.xml.soap.SOAPConnection, com.sicomsa.dmt.Credentials) calls the authentication service in order to get an authorization with a token to be used in other services.
  • Method DownloadService.solicita(jakarta.xml.soap.SOAPConnection, com.sicomsa.dmt.Credentials, com.sicomsa.dmt.Query, java.lang.String) that calls the request download service, providing a request Id that will be used in the verification process of the download request.
  • Method DownloadService.verifica(jakarta.xml.soap.SOAPConnection, com.sicomsa.dmt.Credentials, java.lang.String, java.lang.String) will call the verify request service in order to verift if the request was approved, is pending or if done, provide the package Id's needed to download.
  • With method DownloadService.descarga(jakarta.xml.soap.SOAPConnection, com.sicomsa.dmt.Credentials, java.lang.String, java.lang.String) user will be able to download a package using a package Id provided by the verification.
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    com.sicomsa.dmt
    Provides classes and interfaces to consume SAT's massive download web service.
    com.sicomsa.dmt.solicitude
    This package contains the classes and interfaces needed to encapsulate the status and information of a digital certificates download request using the SAT massive download web service.
    com.sicomsa.dmt.util
    Utility classes to help with SOAP message conversion to strings and from strings; write and read them from Files, and some parsing.
  • Class
    Description
    AbstractGenericSvc<P,Q>
    Implementation of AbstractSvc for generic messages.
    AbstractSvc<P,Q>
    Abstract implementation of Service.
    AuthenticationSvc
    Extends AbstractSvc to provide a concrete implementation of the WS defined to authenticate:
    "https://cfdidescargamasivasolicitud.clouda.sat.gob.mx/Autenticacion/Autenticacion.svc"
    DefaultMessageFactory
    Default implementation of SvcMessageFactory to provide methods needed to build and sign messages.
    DescargaSvc
    Extends AbstractGenericSvc to provide a concrete implementation of the WS defined for downloading specific packages:
    "https://cfdidescargamasiva.clouda.sat.gob.mx/DescargaMasivaService.svc"
    DownloadService
    Default implementation of DMTService to consume the WS.
    LocalRepository
    Download repository implementation that saves downloads in a specified directory.
    OasisSecurity
    Utility methods for signing envelopes according to the security requested by the WS of CFDI downloads.
    Service<P,Q>
    Interface that defines the method and parameters needed to implement a service that consumes a massive download SAT web service.
    SolicitaSvc
    Extends AbstractGenericSvc to provide a concrete implementation of the WS defined for requesting downloads:
    "https://cfdidescargamasivasolicitud.clouda.sat.gob.mx/SolicitaDescargaService.svc"
    SvcMessageFactory
    Defines methods needed to build and sign messages.
    SvcSignatureFactory
    Provides digital signature related methods needed for the WS this package was made for.
    VerificaSvc
    Extends AbstractGenericSvc to provide a concrete implementation of the WS defined for verifying download requests:
    "https://cfdidescargamasivasolicitud.clouda.sat.gob.mx/VerificaSolicitudDescargaService.svc"
